job_responsibilities: Team up with Head of Product on leading feature discovery and ideation from the ground up
Work closely with engineers to manage development of new platforms
Contribute to hands-on automated testing efforts
Use data and tooling to analyze user engagement metrics
job_requirements: At least 3 years of experience in Product Management coming out of Startup or Fintech SaaS companies
Experience working on end-to-end automated testing using Cypress or Selenium
Experience with Figma or other design tools
